requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Modern x86 with 6+ cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern dedicated GPU that supports Vulkan 1.2
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Storage: 4 GB available space
